Class GuiGuide

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cetask.guide.GuiGuide
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiExample

    public abstract class GuiGuide
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for connecting Swing GUI to Guide. See ExampleGui (in unnamed package) for example of use.
